mapper.delete: delete from ms_tt where state=1 and REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update ms_tt set state=2 where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
